info.name: what the actual fucking fuck tumblr
info.description: what did you do and why
info.additionalInfo: 05 February =========== INITIAL RELEASE. Redone to be used in conjunction with Tumblr - The Old Design and its substyle Tumblr - Classic Editor. At this point, all it does is get rid of the little spinny plus sign, and make the .tray class containing the add photo, read more, etc. buttons visible at all times. 29 Jan 2015 =========== Initial attempt to make tumblr act like the well-run, well-designed site it used to be, way back in, like, 2004. Or, at the very least, the somewhat-functional site it was last Wednesday. Seriously. What the fuck.
